name: Renewer of Shores
text:
When Renewer of Shores enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus two, then discard two cards.
Flood {2}{u}{u} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{u}{u} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
Whenever you flood Renewer of Shores, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
